mapper.select: select clm.ord_no, clm.ord_goods_no, clm.ord_item_no, clm.ord_seq, clm.proc_seq, clm.ord_clm_tp_cd, clm.ord_prgs_scd, clm.dv_rvt_ccd, clm.ord_amt, clm.ord_cnt, clm.cncl_cnt, clm.rtgs_cnt, clm.dv_grp_no, clm.ord_clm_req_dtime, clm.ord_clm_acpt_dtime, clm.ord_clm_cmt_dtime, clm.clm_no, clm.org_proc_seq, gd.goods_sell_tp_cd, brl.ord_no, brl.ord_bnf_no, brl.ord_no, brl.proc_seq, brl.aply_cncl_ccd, brl.aply_amt, bnf.prm_no, bnf.cpn_iss_no, bnf.cpn_knd_cd, bnf.ord_bnf_amt, bnf.degr_ccd from op_clm_info clm inner join op_goods_info gd on clm.ord_no = gd.ord_no and clm.ord_goods_no = gd.ord_goods_no and clm.ord_item_no = gd.ord_item_no left join op_ord_bnf_rel_info brl on clm.ord_no = brl.ord_no and clm.ord_seq = brl.ord_seq and clm.proc_seq = brl.proc_seq left join op_ord_bnf_info bnf on brl.ord_bnf_no = bnf.ord_bnf_no where ( clm.ord_no = #{item.ordNo} and clm.ord_seq = #{item.ordSeq} and clm.proc_seq = #{item.procSeq} )
